title: ARCHIVE
subtitle: Visual memory
description: Visual documentation of our creative journey with AI

criancas-futuro.title: Children of the Future
criancas-futuro.description: Generative art celebrating a regenerative, ancestral future. Children of all ethnicities in cyberpunk-ancestral aesthetics, where technology merges with nature and cultural roots.

velocidades.title: VeloCities
velocidades.description: São Paulo by night in its Brazilian cyberpunk essence. Graffiti alleys, subway life, skaters and street musicians. Urban rhythm captured in neon and shadows.

raizes.title: Roots
raizes.description: Dance, body movement, ancestry and performance. Bodies in expressive motion captured through photographic image studies with generative AI.

egos.title: Egos
egos.description: Dimensional portals, futuristic cities and utopias where technology and nature coexist. The Dream World reveals its complexity — between magical fantasy and nightmare horror.

aguas.title: Waters
aguas.description: Water in its sacred form. Reflections, ancestral memory, bioluminescent falls. The vibration of water as a portal for healing and connection.

criaturas.title: Creatures
criaturas.description: Alien beings, changelings and fantastic creatures from other worlds. Entities that inhabit the threshold between human and supernatural.

guerreiras.title: Warriors
guerreiras.description: Indigenous warrior women in all their strength and resistance. Art created in connection with the Indigenous Women's March - feminine ancestry in struggle.

colagens.title: Ancestral Collages
colagens.description: Ancestral-futuristic fusion in digital form. Past and future fragments meet in compositions bridging ancestral symbols with contemporary aesthetics.

tech-shaman.title: Tech Shaman
tech-shaman.description: The Tech Shaman visual universe. Mystical desert, futuristic sanctuaries, sacred geometry. Where ancient code meets future technology in landscapes of contemplation.

origens.title: Origins
origens.description: First experiments with generative AI in 2022. Mythology, purple-green cyberpunk, exploring possibilities. The beginning of a visual journey.

futures.title: Futures
futures.description: Visions of tomorrow. Virtual reality, infinite cosmic libraries, immersive tech. Portals between worlds where knowledge drifts like stars.
